title: The Best Way to Screw with Kevin - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 06.07.18
description:
Thanks to Audible for supporting our podcast.  Get a free audiobook with a free 30 day trial at http://audible.com/KF or text KF to 500-500.

Visit http://omahasteaks.com and type MORNING in the search bar to get this special Father's Day offer.

Andy and Nick watch the trailer for The Girl in the Spider’s Web, adn talk about Top Gun 2's soundtrack, a Saudi Arabian fashion show, and how we’d mess with each other if we won the $125M.
-Girls in the spiders web trailer (24:12 mins)
-Suspiria trailer (31:20 mins)
-Movies out this weekend (42:25 mins)
-Top Gun 2 to feature new version of the danger zone song (45:00 mins)
-Lottery Winner arrested for dumping $200,000 of manure on ex-box lawn (46:30 mins)
-Saudi Arabian fashion show (53:07 mins)

Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
